project.name: |-- 003-traversing-streams
project.description:
Keywords: + Streams + Collections
This project includes a very simple example that illustrates analogies and differences between streams and collections.
ExternalInternalIterationRunner: Illustrates the differences between internal and external iteration when iterating a collection of dishes to obtain the list of dish names.
StreamsRunner: Illustrates how to: + traverse a stream using stream.forEach + obtain a list of a collection property using collections and streams.
